name: barbour23-ui
description: Barbour23 UI. Yup, that is it.

scripts.buildwebsite: cd website && npm run build && cd ../
scripts.buildcdk: cd cdk && npm run build && cdk synth && cd ../
scripts.build: npm run buildwebsite && npm run buildcdk
scripts.deploy: cd cdk && npm run deploy && cd ../
scripts.build-deploy: npm run build && npm run deploy
